attributes.additional_details:
For example, a vetting process in place for anyone wanting to purchase a new dog or another dog. 
Financial - Employment check, Annual Income, Outgoings - Can the owner afford a dog, financial stress can lead to rational decision's
Criminal Convictions - Does the owner have any previous or recent criminal convictions 
Personal Information - Age, address history, people they may live with or any dependants 
The vetting process is to decline anyone who is not equipped for a long term commitment
attributes.background: Please put in place a vetting process for all  new dog owners or dog owners wishing to purchase another dog and decline the owner if they fail the vetting. This is to help all dogs of any breeds go to a safe forever home where the breed will not be provoked to do something out of character.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:

Introduce screening process for dog owners: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643631
